Comment: We have to remember that the whole world is watching. We sold the world for the last 200 plus years that we are the Shining Light on the hill. We even told people that the Statue of Liberty is all about sending us your huddled masses and your poor. We've lashed out for decades about bad guys, con men, dictators, and terrorists. We spilled our blood in World Wars, and we built up Nations after those wars and spent trillions of dollars in doing so. And along comes Donald Trump, who in one fell swoop destroyed everything that we've built. And yes, the world is watching, and it'll watch what we do to Trump and all his underlings. Are we going to send them to The World Court at The Hague and try them for crimes, or we're going to let them walk away like Richard Nixon did. Brazil is putting its criminal on trial. Argentina and Chile did likewise. The world is watching what's going to happen. Stay tuned to this channel.
